screenshots.description: Payroll settings page showing Daily Wage Calculation section
Daily Wage Calculation table expanded showing three service types: Salary proration (30.45 days), EOS leave encashment (22 days), Unpaid leave deduction (30 days)
Salary Proration configuration modal showing custom days (30.45), salary components selection (Basic + Allowances), and month calculation dropdown
Month calculation dropdown showing three calculation basis options: Working days, Calendar days, Custom days
End of Service eligibility table showing Vacation45 leave type with daily rate calculation
EOS Configure modal showing warning banner 'Daily rate is configured in daily wage calculation setting' with View button
Vacation45 leave type configuration showing disabled fields controlled by global Daily Wage Calculation setting (override indicator)
Leave settings page overview showing Leave Policies, Leave Calendar, and Leave Cycle sections
Leave policies list showing multiple policies including 'Unpaid test' policy with 362 active employees
Edit Leave Policy page for Unpaid test showing warning: 'You cannot change all settings because employees are already assigned to this leave policy'
Leave allowance section showing conditional allowance configuration based on employee job tenure
Leave allowance configuration showing tenure-based allowance conditions
Leave pay rate section showing disabled toggle 'Set conditional pay rate based on employee's leave allowance used' with Unpaid leave option selected
Leave pay rate showing 'How should the daily wage be calculated for unpaid leaves?' section with disabled pay rate type options

Daily wage formula section showing disabled formula fields: 'Basic salary / Custom days 30' with blue info message 'Configured in daily wage calculation setting' and clickable link to payroll settings
Alert box displaying 'Based on the leave allowance used, deduction adjustment for unpaid leaves will be automatically added in payroll table' - complete override indicator validation
